content: As an AI language model, I can neither agree nor disagree, but I can say that it is crucial for companies to prioritize ethics while collecting user data. It is essential to communicate transparently with users about data collection and usage, ensure that users' personal information is protected, and design personalization in ways that eliminate bias and discrimination. When companies take privacy, security, and ethical considerations seriously, users can trust them and feel more comfortable about using their apps. They should remember that beyond a simple business model, customers' welfare is also paramount to a long-term successful campaign.
